entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Legacy 4: Tomb of Secrets

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Legacy 4: Tomb of Secrets*):

ul.li: Description: This game is designed to immerse you in a world of mystery and intrigue, with stunning 3D graphics and physics-based puzzles that will challenge even the most experienced players. Step into the shoes of a young archaeologist and explore the hidden secrets of an ancient tomb. With an immersive point-and-click interface, you'll be able to interact with your surroundings in a way that feels natural and intuitive. Each room in the tomb presents a new challenge, with puzzles that will test your intelligence, creativity, and problem-solving skills. But be warned, the tomb is full of surprises, and someone may be watching your every move. Keep an escape plan in mind at all times, and use your wits and instincts to uncover the truth behind the tomb's mysterious past. As you progress through the game, you'll uncover clues and collect items that will help you piece together the tomb's history and the people who built it. Use your touch controls to inspect objects and take photos of anything that catches your eye, and immerse yourself in the world of the ancient tomb. What sets Legacy 4 apart from other puzzle games is its innovative hint system. If you find yourself stuck on a puzzle, don't worry. The game's built-in hint system will guide you through the most challenging puzzles, ensuring that you never get stuck for long. And with a range of difficulty levels to choose from, you can customize your experience to match your skill level and preferences.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

p.small: Source: Google Play Store, Seen first: 2024-03-30 12:00:24, Generated by LootScraper

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Eastern Market Murder

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Eastern Market Murder*):

ul.li: Description: Step back in time to solve a true crime! Delve into a world of fortune tellers and phrenologists in this twisted true tale of murder and madness. Blood red radishes, a business rivalry, whispers of false friends. When everything is not as it seems, will you foresee how it ends? With options to play at home, or where the events actually occurred, you’ll explore crime scenes, question witnesses and examine evidence to outsmart the killer and reclaim justice for the victim's family.

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Deep Space Rush*):

ul.li:
Description: Join the DeTeam! A top-secret security force that protects the scientific space stations from virus contaminations!
Take on randomly generated levels to save everyone before they all get infected. Avoid traps and monsters to survive the sweep!
Are you ready to protect the space stations from biological threats? Then grab your gun, jump into your ship, and prepare for lift-off!

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - The Enchanted Worlds

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (The Enchanted World*):

ul.li:
Description: The Enchanted World is a beautiful tile sliding puzzle-adventure set in a magical world torn asunder by dark forces.
Guide a young fairy through a series of beautiful environments, delightful puzzles, and meet strange characters on her journey to piece the world back together.
Explore enchanted forests and mysterious meadows, visit barren deserts and descend into dark caves, hop through magical marshes, get into an abandoned factory and visit the surreal future world.
